entry.title: New release for Gladys Assistant: v4.54.0
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Upgrade to Node 22 by @Pierre-Gilles in https://github.com/GladysAssistant/Gladys/pull/2234
  • Clean old open-zwave integration by @Pierre-Gilles in https://github.com/GladysAssistant/Gladys/pull/2237
  • ZwaveJS / MQTT : Better handle MQTT reconnection when broker is unavailable by @Pierre-Gilles in https://github.com/GladysAssistant/Gladys/pull/2236
  • Do not set selector if it already exists by @Pierre-Gilles in https://github.com/GladysAssistant/Gladys/pull/2243
  • Send reset password link to Telegram or NextCloud talk if configured by @Pierre-Gilles in https://github.com/GladysAssistant/Gladys/pull/2238
  • feat(z2m): Add power/current/energy variants by @cicoub13 in https://github.com/GladysAssistant/Gladys/pull/2240
  • MQTT : Add better validation errors on create device form by @Pierre-Gilles in https://github.com/GladysAssistant/Gladys/pull/2244
  • Improve battery low notification by @Pierre-Gilles in https://github.com/GladysAssistant/Gladys/pull/2245

Full Changelog: https://github.com/GladysAssistant/Gladys/compare/v4.53.0...v4.54.0

entry.title: New release for Gladys Assistant: v4.55.0
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Dashboard Chart: Fix missing device feature unit when editing a chart by @Pierre-Gilles in https://github.com/GladysAssistant/Gladys/pull/2246
  • Chat: Enable switch control via user commands by @Pierre-Gilles in https://github.com/GladysAssistant/Gladys/pull/2247
  • Redirect German users to English documentation by @Pierre-Gilles in https://github.com/GladysAssistant/Gladys/pull/2249
  • Increase camera image resolution to 1280px by @Pierre-Gilles in https://github.com/GladysAssistant/Gladys/pull/2248
  • CallMeBot integration for WhatsApp & Signal messages by @Pierre-Gilles in https://github.com/GladysAssistant/Gladys/pull/2250
  • Scene: Add condition "If... Then... Else..." by @Pierre-Gilles in https://github.com/GladysAssistant/Gladys/pull/2239

Full Changelog: https://github.com/GladysAssistant/Gladys/compare/v4.54.0...v4.55.0

entry.title: New release for Gladys Assistant: v4.56.0
